name: Handcrafted Blue Pottery Cup & Saucer Set
description: Elevate your tea time experience with this exquisite blue pottery cup and saucer set, meticulously handcrafted to bring charm and style to your table. Each piece showcases delicate floral patterns in rich blue tones, adding a touch of artistry and elegance to your collection. Made from high-quality blue pottery, this set is perfect for both daily use and special occasions, seamlessly blending beauty with durability. The intricate design and natural finish make it a timeless addition to any kitchen or dining room decor.

name: Handcrafted Blue Pottery Floral Planter
description: Transform your living space with this stunning handcrafted blue pottery planter, adorned with vibrant floral patterns. Perfect for showcasing your favorite plants, this planter brings a touch of elegance and traditional craftsmanship to any room. Made from high-quality blue pottery, it combines durability with a beautiful design, ideal for both indoor and outdoor decor. Enhance your home’s aesthetic with the timeless charm and natural appeal of this decorative piece.

name: Handcrafted Blue Pottery Tea Light Holder Set
description: Create a serene ambiance with this set of handcrafted blue pottery tea light holders. Featuring intricate floral patterns, each holder adds a touch of elegance and warmth to your decor. Ideal for festive occasions or cozy evenings, these tea light holders enhance any space with their timeless charm and soothing light.

name: Elegant Blue Pottery Bathroom Accessory Set
description: Upgrade your bathroom with this elegant blue pottery accessory set, featuring a wastebasket, soap dispenser, cotton jar, and more. Crafted with intricate designs, each piece in the set adds sophistication to your space. Perfect for organizing essentials while adding a decorative touch to modern and traditional bathrooms alike.

name: Handcrafted Blue Pottery Storage Jar
description: Store your essentials in style with this handcrafted blue pottery jar. Its striking design and vibrant blue finish make it a perfect blend of beauty and functionality. Ideal for the kitchen or as a decorative accent, this jar adds a touch of traditional charm to your home.

name: Peacock Design Blue Pottery Decorative Plate
description: Add elegance to your decor with this decorative plate featuring a beautifully hand-painted peacock design. Made from high-quality blue pottery, this plate serves as a stunning wall accent or tabletop display, enhancing your home with its intricate artistry and vibrant colors.

name: Floral Blue Pottery Decorative Plate
description: Brighten up your living space with this floral decorative plate crafted from blue pottery. Featuring a vibrant floral pattern, this plate is perfect as a wall hanging or a unique tabletop piece. Its timeless design brings a touch of artistic charm to any room.

name: Floral Design Blue Pottery Serving Plate
description: Serve in style with this exquisite blue pottery serving plate, adorned with floral designs. Perfect for adding an elegant touch to any meal, this plate is both functional and decorative, bringing a piece of traditional craftsmanship to your dining experience.

name: Pomegranate Design Blue Pottery Plate
description: Enhance your dining decor with this blue pottery plate, showcasing a unique pomegranate design. Handcrafted with care, this plate is perfect for serving or as a decorative display, adding a touch of traditional artistry to your home.

name: Traditional Blue Pottery Plate Set
description: Bring elegance to your table setting with this traditional blue pottery plate set. Each plate features intricate designs that reflect the beauty of craftsmanship. Perfect for formal dinners or casual gatherings, this set adds a classic touch to any dining experience.

name: Blue Pottery Decorative Plate Set
description: Enhance your dining experience with this decorative plate set featuring intricate blue pottery designs. Perfect as wall decor or serving pieces, these plates add an artistic and traditional charm to any setting.

name: Blue Pottery Floral Vase
description: Bring elegance to your home decor with this floral blue pottery vase. Handcrafted with intricate patterns, this vase is perfect for displaying flowers or as a standalone decorative piece.

name: Blue Pottery Cylinder Vase
description: Add sophistication to your space with this cylindrical blue pottery vase, adorned with floral motifs. Perfect for a minimalistic yet artistic touch to your home decor.

name: Round Blue Pottery Vase
description: A unique round blue pottery vase with intricate white floral designs, perfect for adding a traditional touch to any decor. Display this vase as a centerpiece or as an accent on a shelf.

name: Blue Pottery Bulb Vase
description: This bulb-shaped blue pottery vase features beautiful floral designs, making it a perfect addition to both traditional and modern decor styles.

name: Blue Pottery Decorative Vase
description: A beautifully crafted decorative vase in blue pottery, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your decor. Ideal for flowers or as a standalone accent.

name: Blue Pottery Floral Bathroom Set
description: Upgrade your bathroom with this floral blue pottery bathroom set, including essentials like a soap dispenser, tumbler, and more. This set combines functionality with artistic elegance, enhancing your space with vibrant colors and traditional designs.

name: Blue Pottery Condiment Set
description: Add a touch of elegance to your dining experience with this beautifully handcrafted blue pottery condiment set. Perfect for storing and serving condiments, spices, or small snacks, each piece features intricate floral designs, bringing both functionality and charm to your table. Ideal for gatherings and everyday use, this set combines traditional craftsmanship with a unique aesthetic.

name: Oval Marble Coffee Table Set
description: Transform your living room with this luxurious oval marble coffee table set, designed to bring elegance and style to your space. Featuring two tables with sleek marble tops and gold-finished metal frames, this set includes a large and a smaller table that can be used together or separately for a versatile layout. The rich marble surface is both durable and easy to clean, while the modern design complements any interior decor. Perfect for displaying books, vases, or serving coffee, this set adds sophistication to your daily routines and special gatherings.

name: Round Marble Side Table
description: Add a modern and minimalist touch to your home with this round marble side table, perfect for any room needing a sophisticated accent. The table’s marble top showcases natural veining that adds character and elegance, while the slim black metal frame offers stability without overpowering the design. This versatile piece works well as a bedside table, a side table in your living room, or a decorative display for plants and photo frames. Durable and timeless, it’s crafted to enhance both functionality and aesthetic appeal in your space.

name: Tall Marble Console Table
description: Perfect for entryways, hallways, or as an accent in any room, this tall marble console table is a statement of refined luxury and modern elegance. The slender design and sturdy metal frame allow it to fit seamlessly against walls without taking up too much space, making it ideal for smaller areas. The marble top brings a touch of sophistication and is spacious enough for decor pieces, plants, or keys and other essentials. With its clean lines and stylish appeal, this console table elevates your home decor with both function and flair.

name: Square Marble Coffee Table
description: A contemporary addition to any living room, this square marble coffee table combines style and functionality in one sleek design. The spacious marble top provides ample space for drinks, books, and decor, while the sturdy metal frame ensures stability and modern appeal. Its clean lines and sophisticated finish make it suitable for various decor styles, from modern to traditional. This coffee table not only serves as a functional piece of furniture but also as an elegant centerpiece, enhancing the overall ambiance of your living area.

name: Rectangular Marble Dining Table
description: Elevate your dining experience with this rectangular marble dining table, a blend of timeless beauty and contemporary design. The generous marble surface is perfect for family meals and gatherings, providing ample space for dishes and decor. Crafted with a strong base to support the luxurious marble top, this dining table is built for durability and style. Its classic rectangular shape and clean lines make it an easy fit for any dining room, while the natural marble variations add uniqueness and charm to your home.

name: Pedestal Marble Table
description: Add an artistic focal point to your decor with this unique pedestal marble table. Featuring a sculptural base and a sleek marble top, this table stands out as a statement piece in any space. Ideal for entryways or as a decorative accent in living rooms, its design is both contemporary and timeless. The pedestal base adds a touch of sophistication while ensuring stability, and the marble surface is perfect for showcasing your favorite decor items. Transform your home with this blend of artistry and functionality.

name: Dual Pedestal Oval Marble Table
description: Elegance meets modern design in this dual pedestal oval marble table, perfect for contemporary spaces. The table features two beautifully crafted pedestal bases that support a smooth, luxurious marble top with natural veining. Ideal for spacious dining areas or as a centerpiece in grand living rooms, this table brings both sophistication and functionality. Its sturdy base design ensures stability, while the marble surface offers ample space for decorative items or dining essentials. Create a refined and stylish setting with this unique blend of modern elegance.

name: Round Pedestal Marble Table
description: This round pedestal marble table brings a sophisticated charm to any room, making it a versatile addition to modern decor. With its sleek, round marble top and sturdy pedestal base, this table is perfect for compact spaces while making a bold statement. The marble top showcases delicate natural patterns, adding an elegant touch to the functional design. Whether used as a coffee table or a decorative accent, its timeless appeal and solid construction make it a standout piece in any interior setting.

name: Archway Black Marble Console Table
description: The Archway Black Marble Console Table combines luxurious black marble with a unique archway design, creating a dramatic focal point in any space. Its elegant silhouette and rich black finish make it ideal for entryways, hallways, or as a statement piece in living rooms. The console's spacious surface is perfect for displaying artwork, floral arrangements, or decorative accents. Crafted with precision and attention to detail, this console table seamlessly blends bold design with practical functionality, enhancing any modern or classic interior.

name: Natural Stone Console Table
description: Elevate your interior with this Natural Stone Console Table, showcasing a unique design with sculptural lines and refined marble texture. Perfect for entryways or as a chic addition to any living space, this table effortlessly complements both modern and classic decor. Its architectural form and natural stone finish create a stunning visual impact, while the durable construction ensures longevity. Make a bold statement with this artfully crafted console, ideal for those who appreciate sophisticated yet functional design in their home decor.

name: Gold Frame Marble Accent Table
description: This Gold Frame Marble Accent Table brings a touch of glamour to any space, featuring a luxurious marble top supported by a minimalist gold metal frame. Ideal for modern interiors, this accent table is perfect for displaying decor items, serving drinks, or simply as a stylish side table. The marble surface showcases natural veining patterns, adding a unique charm to each piece. Its compact size and elegant design make it versatile for use in living rooms, bedrooms, or office spaces, where it effortlessly enhances the ambiance.

name: Three-Piece Natural Wood Marble Side Table Set
description: This three-piece side table set combines natural wood and marble to create a rustic yet modern aesthetic, perfect for any living space. Each table features a unique, irregularly shaped marble top that rests on sturdy wooden legs, making them versatile for use as side tables, plant stands, or decor accents. The varied heights add dimension to your decor, allowing for creative arrangement options. Ideal for those who appreciate nature-inspired elements in their home, this set brings a touch of organic beauty and elegance.

name: Square Marble Top Accent Table
description: The Square Marble Top Accent Table brings a contemporary flair to any room with its clean lines and minimalist design. Featuring a sleek marble top with a square silhouette, this table sits on a stylish geometric base, making it ideal for modern interiors. Its compact form is perfect for small spaces, offering a chic solution for displaying decorative items or serving as a practical side table. With a blend of elegance and simplicity, this accent table enhances the decor of living rooms, bedrooms, or offices.

name: Modern Marble Coffee Table Set
description: Elevate your living space with this elegant marble coffee table set. This set features a blend of contemporary design and luxurious materials, making it a stunning focal point in any modern interior. The marble tops boast intricate natural veining, complemented by sleek metallic legs for a sophisticated look. Perfect for both casual and formal spaces, these tables offer ample surface area to hold decor, books, or refreshments. Their versatile design allows them to be used together or separately to suit your layout, making them an excellent choice for dynamic and stylish living room arrangements.

name: Minimalist Round Marble Side Table
description: A chic and minimalist addition to any room, this round marble side table combines simplicity with elegance. The tabletop is crafted from premium marble, showcasing unique veining that adds a touch of natural beauty. Its slim, powder-coated metal legs offer a stable base without overpowering the design, making it an ideal fit for modern and contemporary interiors. Whether used as a bedside table or an accent table beside your sofa, this piece enhances the ambiance with its understated luxury and practical functionality. A perfect choice for those who appreciate refined aesthetics and versatile furniture.

name: Elegant Rectangular Marble Console Table
description: Bring a touch of sophistication to your entryway or living room with this elegant rectangular marble console table. The smooth marble surface, with its natural veining, provides a striking contrast to the slim, angular metal frame, creating a balanced look that suits contemporary and transitional decor. Ideal for displaying decorative items, plants, or keeping essentials handy near your doorway, this console table combines practicality with visual appeal. Its clean lines and luxurious materials make it a versatile piece that complements both bold and neutral color schemes, elevating the style of any room it graces.

name: Artistic Marble Pedestal Table
description: This artistic pedestal table is a true statement piece, perfect for those who want to add an element of sculptural beauty to their home decor. The marble top features stunning natural veining, which enhances its visual appeal, while the sturdy pedestal base provides stability and a sense of grandeur. Ideal for use in entryways, hallways, or as an accent piece in living rooms, this table adds a touch of sophistication to any setting. Its unique design combines functionality with artistic flair, making it not only a table but also a focal point in any space.

name: Sleek Square Marble Coffee Table
description: The sleek design of this square marble coffee table brings a touch of modern elegance to any living room. Featuring a spacious marble top with natural veining patterns, this table is both functional and beautiful. The sturdy metal base provides durability and complements the marble top's luxurious look, creating a balanced aesthetic that suits various interior styles. Whether used to hold drinks, decor, or magazines, this coffee table serves as a versatile centerpiece for your space, enhancing its ambiance with its clean lines and sophisticated materials.

name: Marble Nesting Table Set
description: Elevate your living room decor with this luxurious marble nesting table set. Featuring a beautiful marble surface on a sleek metal frame, this set is both functional and stylish, adding a touch of elegance to any modern interior. Perfect for small spaces, these tables can be arranged together or separately, allowing for versatile placement and creating a cohesive look in your home. The sturdy metal frame ensures stability, while the smooth marble top provides a sophisticated surface ideal for displaying decor items, serving guests, or simply enjoying a cup of coffee. A timeless addition to any space, these tables blend seamlessly with contemporary and classic styles alike.

name: Ornate Marble Temple
description: This beautifully crafted marble temple exemplifies traditional Indian craftsmanship with its intricate carvings and graceful design. Perfect for creating a spiritual corner in your home, this temple is crafted from high-quality marble, providing durability and elegance. The detailed carvings reflect traditional artistry, making it an exquisite choice for devotion spaces. Whether you’re placing it in your living area or a dedicated prayer room, this marble temple serves as a peaceful retreat for prayer and meditation. Its sturdy structure and timeless design make it a worthy addition to any home seeking an aura of serenity.

name: Classic White Marble Temple
description: This white marble temple captures the essence of spiritual sanctity with its pristine finish and elegantly carved details. The classic design includes intricate motifs that add an air of sophistication to any space. Ideal for devout spaces in homes, this marble temple is designed to accommodate your deities while enhancing the overall aesthetic of your home. Its white marble construction not only ensures longevity but also adds a touch of purity and peace. Perfect for daily rituals, this temple is both a decorative and devotional masterpiece, embodying tranquility and devotion.

name: Ornamental Marble Mandir
description: The Ornamental Marble Mandir is a luxurious choice for those seeking an elaborate and artistic piece for their home. Designed with painstaking attention to detail, this mandir is adorned with decorative elements that enhance its spiritual ambiance. Made from premium marble, this piece showcases a blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern durability, making it a significant addition to your devotional space. Whether as a focal point in your living room or a special place in a prayer room, this mandir resonates with a sense of devotion and beauty that is sure to inspire.

name: Elegant Marble Pooja Stand
description: This Elegant Marble Pooja Stand brings simplicity and grace to your devotional setup. Featuring a minimalistic design with delicate carvings, this piece is perfect for homes that value both style and spirituality. Constructed from high-quality marble, the pooja stand ensures durability and timeless appeal. Its design is ideal for daily rituals, providing a dedicated space for your spiritual practices while adding a refined touch to your home decor. This stand is perfect for those who seek a simple yet elegant addition to their worship space.

name: Carved Marble Prayer Niche
description: The Carved Marble Prayer Niche is a beautiful combination of functionality and artistic expression. Ideal for personal prayer spaces, this niche features intricately carved patterns that reflect the beauty of traditional art. Crafted from premium marble, it offers both durability and elegance, serving as an inspiring place for meditation and daily prayers. The thoughtfully designed niche allows you to create a peaceful sanctuary within your home, bringing a sense of calm and spirituality to your surroundings. Perfect for devotees seeking a unique and meaningful decor piece for their home.

name: Sunburst Mosaic Design
description: Brighten up your space with this captivating Sunburst Mosaic Design, featuring a dynamic arrangement of vibrant colors in a starburst pattern. This mosaic piece showcases deep blue, red, and yellow tiles intricately arranged to form a radiant circular design, perfect for both indoor and outdoor settings. Its vibrant pattern makes it an ideal focal point, adding a touch of artistic flair to patios, walkways, or walls. Each tile is carefully placed to create a harmonious yet eye-catching aesthetic that exudes warmth and positivity.

name: Floral Mandala Mosaic
description: Embrace the beauty of nature with this stunning Floral Mandala Mosaic. This intricate piece is crafted with warm hues of red, orange, and yellow, forming a mesmerizing floral pattern. Each tile is meticulously laid to create an impressive mandala design that evokes a sense of calm and serenity. Perfect for adding a decorative element to interiors, garden walls, or as a statement piece in a living space, this mosaic embodies the timeless appeal of mandalas and the organic beauty of floral motifs.

name: Eagle Head Mosaic
description: This Eagle Head Mosaic captures the strength and beauty of the eagle, symbolizing freedom and power. Made from natural stone pieces, this design is an earthy representation of the majestic bird, with various shades of brown, cream, and rust arranged to form the eagle’s proud profile. Ideal for rustic interiors, cabins, or as a unique wall accent, this piece brings a touch of nature and artistic craftsmanship into your space, perfect for wildlife enthusiasts and lovers of nature-inspired decor.

name: Colorful Fish Mosaic
description: Add a splash of color to your decor with this vibrant Colorful Fish Mosaic. Crafted with an array of brightly colored tiles, this design captures the playful essence of aquatic life. The mosaic features a tropical fish in vivid blues, greens, and oranges, creating a striking visual that is perfect for coastal homes, aquariums, or bathrooms. The intricate tile work brings out fine details of the fish's scales and fins, making this piece an exquisite example of mosaic art.

name: Octopus Mosaic Design
description: Dive into an underwater world with this captivating Octopus Mosaic Design. Using a variety of vibrant, ocean-inspired colors, this mosaic art piece brings the beauty and mystery of marine life to your decor. The octopus is intricately detailed with swirling tentacles and vibrant colors, creating a dynamic and eye-catching display. Ideal for bathrooms, pool areas, or as a wall feature in a coastal-themed room, this mosaic exudes the energy and elegance of the sea.

name: Blue Fish Mosaic
description: This Blue Fish Mosaic brings the serene beauty of the ocean into your space with its calming shades of blue and accents of orange. Crafted with precision, the mosaic showcases a fish with intricate detailing, highlighting the scales, fins, and contours of the aquatic creature. Perfect for enhancing a coastal or marine-themed decor, this mosaic is suitable for bathroom walls, poolside installations, or any space that could benefit from a touch of oceanic elegance.

name: White Marble Tiger Sculpture
description: A majestic white marble tiger sculpture crafted with intricate details. This piece captures the strength and grace of the tiger, making it an elegant addition to any decor. The fine craftsmanship in marble offers a lifelike appearance, ideal for adding a touch of the wild in a sophisticated way.

name: Abstract Stone Face Sculpture
description: An abstract stone sculpture of a face, perfect for contemporary interiors. The unique design and rough texture add character and depth to any space. This artistic piece is a subtle yet impactful way to showcase personality in your decor.

name: Leaf-Shaped Stone Sculpture
description: Elegant leaf-shaped stone sculptures that bring a natural element to your decor. The delicate curves and cutouts make this piece a versatile accent for both indoor and outdoor settings, embodying the beauty of nature in art form.

name: Miniature Marble Temple Ruin
description: A miniature marble structure replicating ancient temple ruins, adding historical and cultural depth to your decor. Its rugged design and polished marble finish evoke a sense of timeless artistry.

name: Red Sandstone Twin Lady Sculptures
description: Twin sculptures of ladies crafted from red sandstone. Their poised stance and traditional attire add a cultural touch, making them ideal for both indoor and outdoor settings, especially in themed or rustic spaces.

name: Circular Marble Art Sculpture
description: A modern circular sculpture crafted from marble, featuring a unique open design. The clean, minimalist look adds a contemporary element to any decor, making it a perfect centerpiece for modern interiors.

name: White Marble Tiger Sculpture
description: A majestic white marble tiger sculpture crafted with intricate details. This piece captures the strength and grace of the tiger, making it an elegant addition to any decor. The fine craftsmanship in marble offers a lifelike appearance, ideal for adding a touch of the wild in a sophisticated way.

name: Abstract Stone Face Sculpture
description: An abstract stone sculpture of a face, perfect for contemporary interiors. The unique design and rough texture add character and depth to any space. This artistic piece is a subtle yet impactful way to showcase personality in your decor.

name: Leaf-Shaped Stone Sculpture
description: Elegant leaf-shaped stone sculptures that bring a natural element to your decor. The delicate curves and cutouts make this piece a versatile accent for both indoor and outdoor settings, embodying the beauty of nature in art form.

name: Miniature Marble Temple Ruin
description: A miniature marble structure replicating ancient temple ruins, adding historical and cultural depth to your decor. Its rugged design and polished marble finish evoke a sense of timeless artistry.

name: Red Sandstone Twin Lady Sculptures
description: Twin sculptures of ladies crafted from red sandstone. Their poised stance and traditional attire add a cultural touch, making them ideal for both indoor and outdoor settings, especially in themed or rustic spaces.

name: Circular Marble Art Sculpture
description: A modern circular sculpture crafted from marble, featuring a unique open design. The clean, minimalist look adds a contemporary element to any decor, making it a perfect centerpiece for modern interiors.

name: Twisted Marble Ring Sculpture
description: A striking twisted ring sculpture in marble, symbolizing infinity and unity. Its flowing shape and smooth finish make it an eye-catching decorative item, ideal for modern spaces.

name: Sandstone Elephant Sculpture
description: A charming sandstone sculpture of an elephant with intricate details, perfect for adding a traditional and cultural touch to your decor. Ideal for indoor and outdoor settings.

name: Miniature Family Sculptures
description: Delicate miniature sculptures depicting family scenes, crafted in marble. These pieces celebrate family bonds and are perfect as subtle decor elements in any room.

name: Swan Shaped Marble Bowls
description: Elegant marble bowls shaped like swans, ideal as decorative accents. Perfect for holding small items or as standalone pieces to enhance the aesthetics of any space.

name: Sandstone Lion Head Sculpture
description: A striking sandstone lion head sculpture that captures the fierce and majestic essence of the lion. This piece is carved in sandstone, providing a timeless, natural look suitable for both interior and exterior decor.

name: Limestone Lion Head Sculpture
description: A beautifully detailed limestone lion head sculpture, perfect for adding a bold statement to any space. This sculpture embodies strength and power, ideal for wall-mounted displays in both classic and contemporary settings.
